title: Legend of Mortal
tags: RPG,Choices Matter,Multiple Endings,Replay Value,Lore-Rich,Martial Arts,Drama,Dating Sim,Singleplayer,Strategy,Funny,Narrative,Indie,Adventure,2D,Action,Tactical RPG,Atmospheric,Retro,Sexual Content
description: The game world is set in a turbulent state and the mighty Tang-Man declines. The threats from the old enemies keep coming one after another.As a nobody, will you choose either to leave yourself out of it or to fight for Tang-Man's future and turning the tide? The journey of yours,is unpredictable.
